service_name: Scan Optics Cloud Data Capture Portal
page_content:
Scan Optics Ltd

Scan Optics Cloud Data Capture Portal

The Scan Optics Cloud Data Capture Portal provides UK government agencies with a solid foundation to build additional services and applications to further Digital by Default strategies. Our document automation (using third-party software tools as well as in-house open source developed software) provides for extremely efficient forms processing.

Features

  • Multiple forms processing (forms automation and recognition)
  • Departmental processing (with automated and manual exceptions handling)
  • Reporting & Auditing - Real-time workflow dashboard (including Crystal Reports)
  • Key From Image (KFI) - multiple image correction
  • Multiple Data Outputs (messageQ, ftp, sftp, SOAP)
  • Support for multiple scanner interfaces
  • Automated cheque processing and dynamic workflow
  • EMC Captiva Support (including Formware)
  • A2iA software support
  • Agile project management methodology

Benefits

  • Technical and Graphical application design
  • Multi-vendor software support
  • Change management
  • Cross-training and knowledge transfer
  • High Accuracy on recognition rates
  • Open development environment (.net, C++, C#, Visual Basic)
  • System maintenance (admin, update, patching, audit)
  • Case work and special processing (CASP)
  • Security cleared personnel
  • Award winning support and Help Desk

Pricing

£15000 per unit per year

  • Excluding VAT
  • Termination costs apply
  • Minimum contract period: Year
